          <title>
            <string language="en">Making an artificial rainbow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden eines künstlichen Regenbogens</string>

            <string language="en">This illustration shows how to make an artificial rainbow by spraying water.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment faire un
